Step sequencer using SvelteKit and Web Audio API. Includes: patterns, multiple synths, scale highlighting and automatic state storage in URL.

`npm run build` for static export.

[Github Pages](https://dawdmaow.github.io/sveltesequencer/)

[Example](https://dawdmaow.github.io/sveltesequencer/#N4IgbgpgTgzglgewHYgFwEYA0IAOBDAFwOiRjQG1Q4ATNABmwCMJCYAFaAWRZgFcoIaACzYYxHO2gAhFgWHYANngCe0MqnKVccAgGMAFhHUh0QugHYAzOaEAOW5YCsjywCZbIAL6ZQOHQaM0EzMrG3snF3cvH209Q2N0OgBOJMd0dAA2V3McjOjff3ig0wtrOwdnNw9vArjA1GDSsIrI6pi-OoTk1PSsnPM8mtiAhJCy8MqooY6R4u60zOzc-OGihpLQ8oiqlZm1xs2J1t3C+pN53qWBk87isebtqfbT0aatybba2fWLxf7B563db3d7HaYvOYpBZ9ZaeAC6mC0ezOjlsyQyQic6CSlgsOKStiEN2+IFR6MxaRxeMsBKJ4KBpLRSQxWKp5nxhOJ+zoXJRTJZlNx7JpnPpJLJzIp2KFHLpgPF--44UEgWWMFIRhRFjhRdmbjxaaiXWslqUBelCWhdlkUrmlQWZYV4XFdFsmxfl5U5EVKUlXlZUhQ1lVNdV+lxQV7U5c19aNrQqCuEwsiSJ2PD8IIqCWKI4gTSOcioCIIDjmoU7UXcH47k8W3vocu03jVPxQpc-ybiCn57TFB3bo8x36YkZ2Hq+xHbYdD1Pi9L5dQyjh4VCBHhVRt0gDyyEQ+9DQQ-x+2MuSrIGtqyF6kjWqitDCOSujwoo1jUPw2jgoY+ZCqIyTeOY0Tiq4yqqO05T9NYz19VJVVPqE2DXMneDfENjETazWN7ZcFNvYrfNg6LbIY4qBtGgCSSPP6SrDJq8rnNa5D2sE7r8Ma9y+vc8bvOw4iBum6rVvqzbms6w7euO5bzsm67Zv80NfZtgQE1dj2M2rQOQ7SLLktrfLk6Ky7TuxzH8du3HicJx77vW2ntsZ-bcPJ7nqdJ-nKfpwXxdF5nJfl2X9tO4NgvDY4Iu+x2-vTX2wcy6O4frVHmhV0bWf9xX1d92chuj3bg8j8YY-TxP4-whbeel0vlcr8Pa+Txv89D5vhdb7PDu11Qw0ZI3fvi4HUsh1AS1yxO6i9-vQQz8-c8Hzv29T6-A+f0-MNv9-Gui894gOXqA1e4D16QN3mA2BEC4FQIQf3I+IAhbmDPs3C+bcFrDjDqtbuD8lYwPgSQxBpDiFkMoRQ6hv9oG0KQfQzOOc6Hvy-v-H+rC-58w4YAth3CP6cJYd--Q2LcUEtQHQTwQA)
